#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <string.h>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int i,j,k,n,cases;

	scanf("%d",&cases);
	while(cases > 0)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		string s, t;
		int aa, ab, bb, ba, caa,cab,cbb,cba;
		map<string, int> mp;

		for(i = 0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin >> t;
			mp[t]+=1;
		}

		aa = mp["aa"];
		caa = aa/2;
		aa = aa%2;

		bb = mp["bb"];
		cbb = bb/2;
		bb = bb%2;

		ab = mp["ab"];
		ba = mp["ba"];

		for(i = 0;i<caa;i++)
			s+="aa";
		for(i = 0;i<min(ab,ba);i++)
			s+="ab";
		for(i = 0;i<cbb;i++)
			s+="bb";
		if(aa)
			s+="aa";
		else if(bb)
			s+="bb";
		for(i = 0;i<cbb;i++)
			s+="bb";
		for(i = 0;i<min(ab,ba);i++)
			s+="ba";
		for(i = 0;i<caa;i++)
			s+="aa";

		cout << s << endl;

		cases--;
	}

	return 0;
}
